name: A Thief in Death's Realm
description:
A Thief in Death's Realm is a solo meditation or tabletop rpg, where you break through the veil into Death's Realm to find something that was taken from you. It uses a Tarot-inspired card laying system as the spark of each step of your adventure. 

The PDFs below are everything you need in order to play, except for the rules, which are available in a Google Doc. We are still putting the finishing touches on things, once that's done we'll upload a PDF of the final rules.
